mapper.select: select * from member where mno > 0 order by mno desc
mapper.insert: insert into member (mno,id, pw, nickname, phone, email, memberType, profile_Img, authority) values(member_mno_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{memberType}, #{profile_Img}, #{authority})
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, nickname =#{nickname},phone =#{phone}, email = #{email}, profile_Img =#{profile_Img}, udate = sysdate where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw=#{pw}
